cover_letter:
Dear Hiring Team,

I'm applying for the Software Engineer (GovTech) position at AvePoint. I'm a Software Engineer who builds full-stack platforms powered by AI agents and automation — and I'm looking to bring that mindset to AvePoint.

At EXAIL Robotics, I develop core features in C++ and JavaScript — including an eye-tracking system — while maintaining product stability through ongoing bug resolution. I also built ValoFenua, a full-stack React platform with Supabase authentication, PostgreSQL database, and client-side PDF generation. I also automated installation processes at EXAIL, cutting deployment time from ~2 days to ~2 hours (85% reduction) and enabling non-technical staff to perform deployments independently.

I'm completing my M.S. in Information Systems Engineering (expected 2026) and I'm eager to contribute to building impactful technology for the public sector.

Aodren Gloux

commentaire: Entry-level frontend role at Sea in Singapore matching Aodren's profile. Strong alignment with React/Supabase experience from ValoFenua and automation expertise demonstrated through the 85% deployment optimization at EXAIL.
